"A.P.241/4/17/15:30": "The ARKS ship has transported?! The ending coordinates are... wait, we're near the mothership! We were sent back to our universe?!"
"Ugh, the administrative controls are all messed up! Regardless, I need to respond to the inquiry from the mothership... What?"
"I... can't respond?! Communication to the other ships has been blocked?!"
"But the limiter on the ship is still active! We can't fight against the intruders with it on!"
"Emergency code... not working! Interrupt code... not working! They're blocked all of our measures!"
"How were they able to do this?! To interrupt our technology so easily...?"
"I've been here countless times through PSO2, but this is my first time coming here directly... It's a strange feeling."
"It's all thanks to them coming to the moon. Once we had the coordinates, transportation was simple. This is going just as Mother wanted."
"Hmm... The materials used for construction... All the unique architecture... Everything here is distracting me."
"...Aratron. Don't forget why we're here."
"Hoho. Of course, Ophiel. If we elders don't make sure everything goes as planned, I won't be able to face Och and Phul."
"To those who are too far, listen to the sound! To those who are close, see with your eyes!"
"My name is Aratron Tolstoy! Mother Cluster, Apostle of Earth! Those who don't fear death, come before me!"
"Oh?"

"……今のは、警告。
このまま帰ってくれないかな。"

"なんじゃなんじゃ、熱烈な歓迎じゃのう。
アークスシップ内でのアークスには
リミッターがかかってるのではなかったか？"

"シップ内のリミッターをものともせずに
戦闘可能な存在がいると、マザーは仰っていた。"

"その一人が、<%me>。
そして、もう一人。"

"創世器、明錫クラリッサⅢの所持者。
……貴公が「マトイ」か。"
"……どうしてわたしの名前を。"

"ほほ。なんでかのう？
知りたくば、その力をもってして
問いただしてみせよ！"
